text: @DanPatrick @susancarleton1 Oh and your little secret economic task force headed by your multi-millionaire buddy G. Brint Ryan? Are you setting him up to confiscate as much of the $11 bill set to come to Tx that's supposed to help small biz & workers? Don't trust you AT ALL. #COVID19
